updates.title: Welcome to the 2025 Masters Pick'em!
updates.content: Welcome everyone to this year's Masters Tournament Pick'em pool! The tournament starts Thursday, April 10th. Make sure your picks are in before the first tee time. Good luck to all participants!

updates.title: Round 1 Complete
updates.content: What a first round! We've got some great performances from our picked golfers. The leaderboard is tight - this is going to be an exciting tournament. Check the leaderboard above for current standings.
